description.value:
When the wearer takes damage for the first time during a combat encounter, reduce that damage by 1 (min 0) Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like a Skull with three sylised gems inset beneath

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Awarded for continuing to fight despite suffering a Critical Wound.

Effect: Special

Notes: -

Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like a Skull
